page.title: 13ENTERTAINMENT IN CHINGFORD
page.content:
There are many attractions in Chingford which would appeal to all age groups. Chingford has an assembly hall where many events are held.It can be used for private functions such as dances, or dinners and for stage shows. Local operatic and dramatic groups stage musicals and plays in they are much enjoyed.Musical evenings can be heard in some of the local churches. One of the school halls holds a disco for young people on Friday evenings. There used to be a cinema at the top of Station Road.Local pups attract adults of all ages to enjoy a comical evening.
